wsj.title: Simple, Bedrock Rules on Personal Finance
wsj.topComment: Years ago I read the final article of a journalist who I have forgotten.  His number "10" I always remember. He said, "remember money problems are not real problems".  You can do something about money problems..get another job, work more hours, etc. ...

wsj.title: Our Amazingly Plastic Brains
wsj.topComment: I experienced traumatic brain injury in 1977, when I was 17-- car accident, craniotomy, coma, paralysis. My life of growth, change, continuous learning and healing strongly validates this article.
